page.title: 08HALLOW'S VICAR AT WORK.
page.content: Hallow Parish is a very peaceful place.{The vicar Mr. Willows,}lives in the village in the vicarage.He likes living in Hallow.He takes five { {services}a week in the church.There are about{14 weddings}a year in the village,mostly local people and up to{40 burials}in the church yard at which he ministers.At{Christmas and {Easter}there are more{services}to prepare but these are his favourite times of year.There are always people to{visit}and{Mrs.Willows}helps here.In his spare time Mr.Willows works on an old car,takes his dog for walks,and vists the theatre.Visiting people when relations have died is often difficult and lonely people enjoy a visit too.On Friday mornings he takes{school {assembly}and is the chairman of the {School Govenors.}On special occasions he takes{school church}services too.
